combobox.desc: With combobox you can allow a user to create new values that may not be present in a provided items list. Keep in mind, this component only supports arrays of **primitive** items and cannot be used with props such as `item-text`, `item-value` for example.

comboboxMultiple.desc: This is a multple version of **combobox** - user is allowed to enter more than 1 value

slots.item: Scoped slot for designating the markup for a list-tile
slots.selection: Scoped slot for designating the markup for the selected items
